description:
Morey Avenue Early Childhood Development Center is a learning space that provides
comprehensive services for the whole family and child. Our individualized connections to
each family help to create a sense of belonging for each individual that steps onto our
campus. The diversity of staff, family, and the community of Morey Ave. is celebrated and
appreciated. Generations of families choose to attend Morey Ave. because it is a learning
environment centered on early childhood development.
